description: This Dart file serves as a project indicator by importing Flutter's material package and defining a widget that has no runtime effect. Its purpose is to signal to analyzers that the project is a Flutter project.

classes.name: _FlutterProjectHint
classes.description: A stateless widget that returns an empty sized box, used solely to signal project type to analyzers.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method that returns an empty widget, contributing nothing to the UI.
